# longestActivity

**Instance Property**

The date interval of the user’s longest activity session during the activity segment.

## Declaration

```swift
var longestActivity: DateInterval?
```

## Discussion

This value may be `nil` if the user was not active on this device during [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/ActivitySegment/dateInterval].
title: longestActivity
